name: Strip Domain v2
description: Strips everything from and URI and leaves only the base name of the domain. Doesn't work with sub-domains and IP address URL's. Can match everything in even a complicated Google search result URL.Includes all known official TLD's, plus future proof TLD's included that are currently in consideration.Eg: http://www.domain.co.uk/~dir?arg=var&another=argResult filters everything and leaves: "domain"2011
author: Luke Wilson
